Message

This class contains the inernals needed by every overlay to be displayed in the DOM.  The Display class makes heavy use of messages as a means of controlling how and where content is displayed.

Parameters

paramsObject containing attributes to assign to the message.  All attributes are optional.
Summary
Message
This class contains the inernals needed by every overlay to be displayed in the DOM.
Functions
Message
Initializes the Object
read
Markes the state of the message as read.
show_in_queue
If a queue is specified for this message true is returned otherwise the function returns false.

If a queue is specified for this message true is returned otherwise the function returns false.

Returns

True or False

Message.prototype.show_in_queue = function()
If a queue is specified for this message true is returned otherwise the function returns false.
Used by the extension to handle the rendering of overlays and events to the browser viewport.
